title: Korean Beef Bulgogi
ingredients: ['450g frying steak, thinly sliced', '5 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 1/2 tablespoons caster sugar', '4 tablespoons chopped spring onion', '2 tablespoons minced garlic', '2 tablespoons sesame seeds', '2 tablespoons sesame oil', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper']
